artist: Etcher: Valentin Lefebre; Artist: After Titian (Tiziano Vecelli); Publisher: Jacobus van Campen
description: foreground flock of goats grazing; goat herd asleep under tree left foreground; stream at right with arched bridge in center ground; buildings on left side of river center ground and distance
inscription:
Signature, and Inscriptions

In plate in black: [To an in.   J. Van Campen Formis Vensiss    V. Lefebre del. et sculp.]; in pencil on mount: [1-405]
title: Sleeping Goat Herd and Flock in a Landscape
